Desc.entry: A registered charity that runs a self help group for people who want help to deal with their addiction. This could be addiction to alcohol, substances, gambling, sex or any other addiction. The group is run by people in the same situation and everyone in the group supports each other with their recovery. Company Limited by Guarantee 4121117.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sat 11am-12.30pm, please ring for a chat in advance before attending
